name: CUBO (Anselmo A. Peretto)
description:
CUBO is a game/puzzle about geometry and 3D projection.

INSTRUCTIONS

The world is a cube. You — using the arrow keys (↑←↓→) to move the white circular block through the circular slots — need to explore all the six faces of the cube in search of the white rectangular blocks (eighteen in all) and than return to base.

There are two special things: the tunnels, used to move the block to the other side of the cube (rotating 180°), and the side shortcuts, used to move the block to the next side of the cube (rotating 90° dependig on the direction).

There isn't a sophisticated animation for the rotations, so theres a blinking icon showing your current position in a multiview projection just below the cube.
